description: This file defines interfaces for a Zigbee Diagnostics Cluster, including callback structures, creation functions, and status query functions, specifically for managing diagnostics such as message signal quality indicators.

methods.name: diagnosticsClusterCreate
methods.description: Creates a Diagnostics Cluster instance with specified callbacks and context.

methods.name: diagnosticsClusterGetLastMessageLqi
methods.description: Retrieves the LQI (Link Quality Indicator) for the last message from a device identified by EUI64 and endpoint.

methods.name: diagnosticsClusterGetLastMessageRssi
methods.description: Retrieves the RSSI (Received Signal Strength Indicator) for the last message from a device identified by EUI64 and endpoint.

ctags.name: lastMessageRssiLqiUpdated
ctags.pattern: /^    void (*lastMessageRssiLqiUpdated)(void *ctx, uint64_t eui64, uint8_t endpointId, int8_t rssi/
ctags.typeref: typename:void (*)(void * ctx,uint64_t eui64,uint8_t endpointId,int8_t rssi,uint8_t lqi)

fields.name: void (*)(void * ctx,uint64_t eui64,uint8_t endpointId,int8_t rssi,uint8_t lqi) lastMessageRssiLqiUpdated
